hackathon-description-text: nwHacks is the largest hackathon in Western Canada, happening on March 13-15 in the Kaiser and MCLD Buildings in UBC. nwHacks will take place over 36h from Friday night till Sunday Morning
hackathon-eligibility: - Teams can have a maximum of 5 members (all members must be physically present at nwHacks)
hackathon-requirements:
- Platforms (iOS, Android, Web / Mobile Web, Mac, Windows, hardware hacks)
- Must include both submission and video demo
- Must select which sponsorship prizes you are going for

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Top pebble hack will receive Pebble Classics for each team member.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Fred Kaiser Building, The University of British Columbia, 2332 Main Mall, Vancouver, BC V6T 1Z4, Canada

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How practical the hack is and whether or not it solves real problems.
How easy and intuitive the interface is to navigate
How hard the hack was (technically) to implement/engineering/build.
How polished/well presnted/finished the hack was during the expo and he demo.

hackathon-location-address: Fred Kaiser Building, The University of British Columbia, 2332 Main Mall, Vancouver, BC V6T 1Z4, Canada
hackathon-description-header: nwHacks is the largest hackathon in Western Canada, happening on March 13-15 in the Life Sciences Atrium in UBC.
